wikipedia_page.main: Simone Buchanan, better known by the name C-Mone, is an English rapper. She is from Nottingham, England.

response: Women have contributed to hip hop's evolution in Britain from the beginning.Chang, Jeff. "Future Shock", "Future Shock", January 2004. Retrieved 14 March 2008. Female British hip hop artists include Alesha Dixon, Baby Blue, Estelle, Lady Leshurr, Lady Sovereign, Little Simz, M.I.A., Monie Love, Nadia Rose, Shystie, No Lay, Stefflon Don, Mercury prize winners Ms. Dynamite and Speech Debelle and music producer Mizz Beats. Other British female rappers have included Cookie Crew, She Rockers, Wee Papa Girl Rappers, NoLay, C-Mone and Envy.
